title: Jennifer Lopez tells a topless Kourtney Kardashian 'dat booty looks goooood'
text:
Kourtney Kardashian got a very big compliment on Thursday from an A-list star.

The 40-year-old TV vet was told by 50-year-old Jennifer Lopez that she had a nice backside. That's quite a remark coming from the woman who is considered to have one of the nicest bottoms in the world.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians standout was topless in her closet as she modeled the 50-year-old diva's jeans she designed for Kohl's.

Girl love: Kourtney Kardashian got a very big compliment on Thursday from an A-list star. The 40-year-old TV vet was told by 50-year-old Jennifer Lopez that she had a nice backside

A closer view: Kourtney was taking a selfie in the mirror. The mother-of-three had her arms over her bare chest as she showed off her naked back. The jeans fit snug as they appeared to be skin-tight and high-waisted. On the back pocket her name was written in cursive

Kourtney was taking a selfie in the mirror. The mother-of-three had her arms over her bare chest as she showed off her naked back.

The jeans fit snug as they appeared to be skin-tight and high-waisted.

On the back pocket her name was written in cursive.

'Trying my jeans,' Kourtney wrote alongside the photo while tagging the musician in the image.

Kourtney and Jennifer are friends through Kim Kardashian. Kim started befriending the Jenny From The Block singer over seven years ago and now J-Lo attends the annual Jenner/Kardashian Christmas party.

Like a sister: Kourtney and Jennifer are friends through Kim Kardashian. Kim started befriending the Jenny From The Block singer over seven years ago and now J-Lo attends the annual Jenner/Kardashian Christmas party; here Jennifer is seen on the cover of new single

Mrs Kanye West has always said that the Hustlers star has inspired her.

In 2018 she said: 'My inspiration for everything has been Jennifer Lopez.

'I would try and see what shoes she’d wear, what makeup, what hair — I became obsessed with glam because of Jennifer.

'I never would have imagined this would have been my life. I always fangirl for her. Dreams do come true, guys!'

Helping her pals: Kourtney was also seen in her closet while modeling an olive green top and leggings. She tagged Kelly Rowland and added a flexed arm emoji

Kourtney was also seen in her closet while modeling an olive green top and leggings.

She tagged Kelly Rowland and added a flexed arm emoji.

The day before Kourtney said she was 'content' not dating anyone when confiding in BFF Larsa Pippen during a vacation in Turks and Caicos seen in a teaser for next week's Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

'I just feel like I'm in a different place where I feel just don't feel like I need that,' the Poosh founder, 40, told her pal.

'I'm content hanging out with my friends. I just feel like I'm on a different vibe. I feel so content with just myself,' she went on.

Flying solo: Kourtney admitted she was fine being single during a chat with Larsa Pippen shared ahead of next week's Keeping Up With The Kardashians

Kourtney was clear she was fine flying solo, telling Larsa: 'I don't feel like I need anybody.'

The scene was filmed at a crucial time in Kourtney's personal life. During the time of the vacation she had recently split from ex Younes Bendjima and had also cut things off with fling Luka Sabbat.

Larsa had also recently filed for divorce from NBA alum Scottie Pippen.

Suggesting the Larsa was back in the dating game, Kardashian said: 'You're in a different place than that.

'And if that's what you're into, I don't want to be judgmental of you.'

'Like you were a month ago,' Larsa laughed.

Me, myself and I: Kourtney was clear she was fine flying solo, telling Larsa: 'I don't feel like I need anybody.'

Doing great: 'I'm content hanging out with my friends. I just feel like I'm on a different vibe. I feel so content with just myself,' she also told her pal

Kourtney continued to say she'd rather spend time at home and be 'silly' and 'dance' instead of going out and partying.

'I just feel like I don't need anyone else to hang out with,' she went on. 'Texting random guys that are meaningless.'

'My energy isn't going toward partying or guys,' Kourtney said.

Not worth it: 'I just feel like I don't need anyone else to hang out with,' she went on. 'Texting random guys that are meaningless'

In the confessional, Kourtney said that it meant a lot to talk to Larsa about where they're both at in life.

'Even if we're at different places in our lives, she'll still be one of my best friends,' she told cameras.

'Trust me you'll go through 10 more phases in the next three months,' Larsa went on to say.

It seems Kourtney is still 'content' with the single life.

Though she's been off the market since her split with Younes, the pair were spotted holding hands while out in LA last month.

An inside insisted the duo are only friends though to People.

'They spend some time together. It's more of a friend situation,' said the source. 'You could call it casually dating. It's definitely not a relationship. They have known each other for a long time and Kourtney has fun with him. She isn't happy about being photographed with him though. She has been trying to just keep it private.'
description: The 40-year-old TV vet was told by 50-year-old Jennifer Lopez that she had a nice backside. That's quite a remark coming from the woman who is considered to have one of the nicest bottoms.
